## Events.BlockChange.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BlockChange` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block, opt_element?: string, opt_name?: string | null, opt_oldValue?: unknown, opt_newValue?: unknown);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | _(Optional)_ The changed block. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_element | string | _(Optional)_ One of 'field', 'comment', 'disabled', etc. |
|  opt\_name | string \| null | _(Optional)_ Name of input or field affected, or null. |
|  opt\_oldValue | unknown | _(Optional)_ Previous value of element. |
|  opt\_newValue | unknown | _(Optional)_ New value of element. |
